alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 2:59AM EST until November 09 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations up to one inch, sleet accumulations around one quarter of an inch, and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Sullivan, Northern Grafton, Southern Grafton, and Cheshire Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy road conditions. A period of mixed precipitation is expected with air temperatures remaining below freezing. Expect slippery road conditions and avoid travel if possible. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton; Sullivan
